column5: Just testing to see if i did this right... and i know how much you guys love pics     If it works, i'm hoping to make a good opening report tomorrow.  It involves my buddies hut going through the ice and 3 five pound whities.  lovetofish
Nice bass, and yes, we do love pics.
Very nice bass....I fish lake Erie alot through open water season. & Yuppers we love pictures......
Ok...I'll be waiting for the hut going thru the ice report!!! Hope no one was hurt!!!
Way to go!   Nice bass you caught. And the pic turned out great too.
Mmmmmm ..... pics.   Looks like you got the picture posting down pat.  Post away .... post away.
nice chunky fish on Erie, God I love smallmouth!
Thanks guys!  Didn't have time the other day, but going to try to post later on today. ps.  everyone was ok...  but it was a close call for everyone involved!
